dt-api.name: row().scrollTo()

type.description: Redraw the table's scrolling display to show the row selected by the `dt-api row()` method.

dt-api.description: This method can be used to jump to a specific row in the DataTable. The row is selected using the `dt-api row()` method, so all of the options available for the `-type row-selector` data type are available.
